a1: AC Milan plays very well, I can see why you like them.
q2: What is AC Milan's best player.

a3: What makes Paolo Maldini AC Milan's best player?
a4: Maldini was one of their strongest defenders of all time and he was very consistent.
a5: Yes we know so we get paid for Milan's win.
